content:
Hello,

This is a fairly broad question, so bear with me, but Is there a community for discussing advanced browser / web features? And if so, where can I find it?

Right now my problem is I have some design questions regarding WebCodec (short story, I'm working on integrating it in VLC's wasm port, but facing obstacles); but last week it was wasm's DWARF format, last month it was how to debug Canvas operations, etc.

So my general problem is I'm looking for a community for discussing technical questions regarding browser APIs, that go beyond the entry-level "how do I use X" and towards the kind of questions where I'd want to talk to the people directly designing the APIs. I'm looking into Google mailing lists. Any advice?
